name: jedison
description: A JavaScript Library that generates forms from JSON Schemas, to editing and validate JSON.

scripts.e2e: yarn e2e:clean && start-server-and-test serve http://localhost:8181 'codeceptjs run-workers 10 -c tests/e2e/codecept.conf.cjs'
scripts.e2e:b3: yarn e2e:clean && THEME='bootstrap3' start-server-and-test serve http://localhost:8181 'codeceptjs run-workers 10 -c tests/e2e/codecept.conf.cjs'
scripts.e2e:b4: yarn e2e:clean && THEME='bootstrap4' start-server-and-test serve http://localhost:8181 'codeceptjs run-workers 10 -c tests/e2e/codecept.conf.cjs'
scripts.e2e:b5: yarn e2e:clean && THEME='bootstrap5' start-server-and-test serve http://localhost:8181 'codeceptjs run-workers 10 -c tests/e2e/codecept.conf.cjs'
scripts.e2e:*: yarn e2e && yarn e2e:b3 && yarn e2e:b4 && yarn e2e:b5
scripts.e2e:grep: yarn e2e:clean && SHOW=true THEME='bootstrap5' start-server-and-test serve http://localhost:8181 'codeceptjs run -c tests/e2e/codecept.conf.cjs --steps --debug --grep @jodit-as-prop'
scripts.test:full: yarn e2e:clean && yarn e2e && yarn unit

author: German Bisurgi <gebisurgi@protonmail.com>
